wminc-code-macrolanguage: A [[wikipedia:$2 language|"$3" language]] is a [[wikipedia:ISO 639 macrolanguage|macrolanguage]],taa la a Kɔkɔrɛɛ ŋa noba:
wminc-code-collective: A bie "$1" ba pukyaare Kɔkɔ yenaa, kyɛ Kɔkɔɛ la, a yoe la [[wikipedia:$2 language|"$3" languages]].
wminc-code-retired: A Kɔkɔre bie leɛ la a koŋ la be a Kɔkɔreŋ.
wminc-custom-editnotice-2: A saŋa naŋ ka fo baŋ a Kɔkɔre for naŋ na de toŋ ne toma, sɔrɔɔ la de a $1. Aseŋ a Kɔkɔɛ ama French ane  bɔrifɔ  Kɔkɔre, de a $2.
wminc-custom-featuredwikis-approved: Ba sage de o la/ bee maale o:
wminc-custom-featuredwikis-active: Ama e la Kɔkɔ bilee kyɛ a koŋ kɔɔre kyɛ sori naŋ yuo ko ba la:
wminc-custom-featuredwikis-permanent: Ama naŋ be la a kyɛ:
wminc-custom-newarticletext-noprefix: sɔrɔɔ la: fo maala la gampɛle kyɛ ba de a [[$1|prefix]]
wminc-custom-newarticletext-withprefix-3: Fo naŋ baŋ maale la gampɛle Paala ([[$1|prefixed]]) ka boɔloo de gampɛle "{{FULLPAGENAME}}".
wminc-custom-newarticletext-withprefix-4: Meŋ eŋ a fo tage lammo prefixes: [[Page title]] to [[Wx/xx/Page title]] and {{Page title}} to {{Wx/xx/Page title}}.
wminc-custom-newarticletext-withprefix-5:
Ka fooŋ naŋ e a, fo naŋ de la a [[$1|Add
 Prefix gadget]].
wminc-custom-tb-incorrect-title-title: Fo maala la gampɛle gane ne yuori na ba tori.
wminc-custom-tb-incorrect-title-text:
A yuori ba taa [[$1|prefix]] bee o e la bonne na ba tu a tuubu gɔɔloŋ.

Ka fooŋ yi zie kaŋa wa, sɔrɔɔ la leɛ gaa te eŋ a tage lammo na fo naŋ maala. Ka fooŋ boɔra ka fo maale a gampɛle ŋa daadaa eŋ a yuori velaa.

Ka yeli zaa kyɛ ka fo koŋ tõɔ maale gampɛle zaa, page a [[$2| a niŋderɛɛ soba]].
wminc-custom-tb-invalid-code-title: A fo boɔrɔ ka fo maale gampɛle kyɛ ba taa [[$1|ISO 639-1 or -3 code]].
wminc-custom-tb-invalid-code-text:
A bie ama kaŋa zaa ba tona bee ba be a Kɔkɔre kyaare ne a Wikipiideɛ toma yɛlɛ.

Ka fooŋ wa kpɛ a zie ŋa kyɛ ba yi a kyɛ, sɔrɔɔ la leɛ gaa a tage lammo a kpɛ maale a gampɛle yuori.

Ka fooŋ kyɛ kyɛ ka gbuli bonne ba sagra ka fo naŋ maale a gampɛle fo naŋ teɛrɛ ka o Toma la de a ISO 639-1 bee -3 bee naŋ be a Kɔkɔreŋ, sɔrɔɔ la [[$1| gaa a niŋderɛɛ zie na o soŋ]].
wminc-custom-tb-space-colon: Yɛlɛ mine Zuni, a yelzu naŋ baŋ piili la ne vuo bee pule bie.
gadget-addprefix: Eŋ prefix: omeŋɛ na eŋ la a prefixes tage lammo kyɛ maale a gampɛle.
wminc-gadget-addprefix-help: A ba seŋ ka de a prefix ka fooŋ wa maala gampɛle. O ma eŋ la o meŋɛ gampɛle.
gadget-interwiki: Interwiki: eŋ a toŋ toŋ ane a Kɔkɔre soga a tage lammo a yi a wikidata poɔ.
wminc-gadget-iw-dialog-text: De a gane ŋa eŋ a interwiki tage lammo. Eŋ a wikidata  ID bee URL bonne bee Aatikle a Kɔkɔre kaŋa poɔ kyɛ neɛ "{{int:wminc-gadget-iw-dialog-publish}}".
wminc-gadget-iw-dialog-replace-text: Neɛ a "{{int:wminc-gadget-iw-dialog-publish}}", fo na leɛre a interwiki bonkore a zie ŋa la a gampɛle naŋ na toŋ a Wikidata poɔ. A Aatikle naŋ na de la tuuro:
wminc-gadget-iw-dialog-replace-editinste: Ka onaŋ ba e soŋ,  sɔrɔɔ la maale gampɛle a de eŋ a tage lammo.
wminc-gadget-iw-dialog-learn-more: Zanne yɛlɛ gaga kyaare neŋ a wikidata
wminc-gadget-iw-error-invalid: A Wikipiideɛ ID fo naŋ eŋ bee a gampɛle na da tage lantaa ba leɛ kyɛbe, bee a gampɛle ba tu a wikidata kpɛ. Sɔrɔɔ la leɛ e nyɔ.
wminc-gadget-iw-error-reload: Sɔrɔɔ la leɛ kpɛ a gampɛle bee fo leɛ kpɛ.
wminc-gadget-iw-editsummary: Eŋ nɛ a interwiki tage lammo a [[d:$1]]
tag-gadget-interwiki-description: Maale eŋ a interwiki tage lammo a derɛ a interwiki boŋmeɛre.
gadget-settestwikipreference: Eŋ a " Kɔkɔre maala" ane ( ŋmaa toma) aŋa fo sɛgerɛ toma. Puli konkogre zie daa ka fooŋ wa kaa a wiki ŋmaaroŋ
wminc-gadget-twpref-setlang-tooltip: Maale a niŋɛ Kɔkɔre te ta $1
wminc-gadget-twpref-setwiki-tooltip: Maale $1 ka o e fo ŋmaaroŋ toŋ toŋ bonne, a lɛ wuli ka a gampɛle paalaa ŋa na be la a toma poɔ.
